txRejected.tx_rejected_info: Transaction rejet√©e par la cl√© SSP.
txRejected.tx_rejected_info_2: Votre transaction ne sera pas incluse dans la blockchain. Vos fonds sont enti√®rement disponibles et peuvent √™tre envoy√©s.

publicNoncesRejected.public_nonces_rejected_info_2: La cl√© SSP a √©t√© rejet√©e pour envoyer des nonces publics. Sans nonces publics, le portefeuille SSP ne peut pas construire de transactions sur les cha√Ænes EVM.

publicNoncesReceived.public_nonces_received_info: Les Nonces publics ont √©t√© re√ßus et stock√©es avec succ√®s. Les Nonces publics sont utilis√©es pour construire des transactions sur les cha√Ænes EVM.

transactionsTable.tx_unconfirmed: Non confirm√©. Transaction pas encore min√©e.
transactionsTable.tx_pending: En attente. La transaction est en attente d'autorisation de cl√© SSP.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_info: Augmente les frais, remplace ou annule la transaction.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_desc: Remplacer par Frais (RBF) vous permet de remplacer une transaction non confirm√©e par une autre transaction qui offre des frais plus √©lev√©s. Si votre transaction n'est pas confirm√©e pour une p√©riode prolong√©e, vous pouvez envisager d'utiliser la fonction RBF pour augmenter les frais de transaction. De plus, il est possible de modifier le destinataire, le montant ou les notes de paiement. En envoyant les fonds √† l'une de vos adresses, vous pouvez √©galement annuler la transaction.
transactionsTable.replace_by_fee_desc_b: RBF exige des frais de transaction plus √©lev√©s dans tous les cas. Le remplacement n'est pas garanti et les producteurs de blocs, les mineurs peuvent toujours privil√©gier la transaction pr√©c√©dente. Seules les transactions non confirm√©es peuvent √™tre remplac√©es.
transactionsTable.err_export: Erreur lors de l'export des transactions. Veuillez r√©essayer.

nodesTable.name: Nom
nodesTable.start_node_info: Cette action va diffuser la transaction de d√©marrage vers la blockchain en essayant de d√©marrer votre n≈ìud {{chainName}}.
nodesTable.start_node_info_2: Assurez-vous que votre n≈ìud {{chainName}} fonctionne et passe le benchmark avant de d√©marrer votre n≈ìud pour √©viter le statut DOS.
nodesTable.delete_node_info: Cette action rendra votre garantie verrouill√©e sur le n≈ìud {{chainName}} disponible pour les d√©penses.
nodesTable.delete_node_info_2: Votre n≈ìud {{chainName}} continuera √† fonctionner et pourra √™tre configur√© √† nouveau si votre n≈ìud n'est pas d√©pens√©.
nodesTable.open_fluxos_info: Cette action ouvrira FluxOS dans votre navigateur, r√©duisant ainsi votre portefeuille SSP.
nodesTable.err_start: Erreur lors du d√©marrage du n≈ìud {{chainName}}. Assurez-vous que votre collat√©ral poss√®de 100 confirmations, et que le statut du n≈ìud est hors ligne, puis r√©essayez.
nodesTable.err_unable_identity: Impossible de g√©n√©rer l'identit√© du n≈ìud. R√©essayez plus tard.
nodesTable.err_delete: Erreur lors de la suppression du n≈ìud {{chainName}}. Veuillez r√©essayer.
nodesTable.add_to_flux_storage_info: Cette action t√©l√©versera votre n≈ìud Flux configur√© vers Flux Storage. Ceci est utilis√© pour simplifier la configuration de votre FluxOS. Vous recevrez un identifiant de stockage √† utiliser pour votre installation de FluxOS.
nodesTable.err_upload_storage: Erreur lors du t√©l√©versement du n≈ìud {{chainName}} vers Flux Storage. Veuillez r√©essayer.
nodesTable.add_to_storage_added: Votre n≈ìud Flux est disponible dans Flux Storage,  vous pouvez maintenant l'utiliser dans votre configuration FluxOS.

sspWalletDetails.err_s1: Code S1 : Une erreur s'est produite lors du d√©chiffrement du mot de passe.
sspWalletDetails.ssp_mnemonic: Phrase de graine mn√©monique du portefeuille SSP
sspWalletDetails.ssp_mnemonic_desc: La phrase de seed est la partie la plus importante de votre portefeuille. Elle est utilis√©e pour d√©river toutes vos cl√©s publiques priv√©es √©tendues. S'il vous pla√Æt, notez-la et gardez-la en s√©curit√©. Si vous perdez votre phrase de graine, vous perdrez l‚Äôacc√®s √† vos fonds. Ne partagez jamais avec qui que ce soit, car elle accorde un contr√¥le total sur la partie portefeuille SSP.
sspWalletDetails.ssp_sync_wallet_key_desc: Ce code QR est utilis√© pour synchroniser votre portefeuille SSP avec votre cl√© SSP. Scannez ce code QR avec votre cl√© SSP pour synchroniser votre portefeuille SSP avec votre cl√© SSP. Cela synchronise √©galement automatiquement la cha√Æne Bitcoin.
sspWalletDetails.chain_sync_ssp_key_desc: Ce code QR est utilis√© pour synchroniser votre portefeuille SSP {{chain}} avec votre cl√© SSP. Scannez ce code QR avec votre cl√© SSP pour synchroniser votre cha√Æne {{chain}}.
sspWalletDetails.chain_extended_pub_desc: La cl√© publique √©tendue est utilis√©e pour d√©river toutes vos cl√©s publiques {{chain}} √† partir desquelles les adresses sont construites. Il s'agit d'une partie publique, s√ªre √† partager, n'accorde pas l'acc√®s aux fonds. C'est ce que SSP Wallet synchronise avec votre cl√© SSP pour g√©n√©rer des adresses.
sspWalletDetails.chain_extended_priv_desc: La cl√© priv√©e √©tendue est utilis√©e pour d√©river toutes vos cl√©s priv√©es {{chain}} qui contr√¥lent vos cl√©s publiques - adresses. Il s'agit d'une partie priv√©e, ne partagez JAMAIS car elle donne acc√®s aux fonds.

addressDetails.wallet_redeem_script_desc: Le code de script d'√©change d√©crit les conditions qui doivent √™tre remplies pour d√©penser les fonds de votre portefeuille. Vous n'aurez g√©n√©ralement jamais besoin de ce code, mais il est bon de l'avoir enregistr√© quelque part au cas o√π vous en auriez besoin. Vous pouvez le partager, il n'accorde pas de contr√¥le sur vos fonds, mais expose les cl√©s publiques.
addressDetails.wallet_witness_script_desc: Le code de script t√©moin d√©crit les conditions qui doivent √™tre remplies pour d√©penser des fonds de votre portefeuille. Vous n'aurez g√©n√©ralement jamais besoin de ce code, mais il est bon de l'avoir enregistr√© quelque part au cas o√π vous en auriez besoin. Vous pouvez le partager, il n'accorde pas de contr√¥le sur vos fonds, mais expose les cl√©s publiques.
addressDetails.wallet_priv_key_desc: La cl√© priv√©e octroie le contr√¥le sur l'adresse sp√©cifique de votre portefeuille. Il s'agit d'une partie priv√©e, ne partagez JAMAIS car elle donne acc√®s aux fonds.

chainsInfo.chain_requests_info: A request to get information about all integrated chains in SSP was received. Following data of each chain will be shared: id, name, symbol, decimals and chainId. No personal data is shared.

Following data of each chain will be shared: id, name, symbol, decimals and chainId. While no personal data is shared, this request can be used to get information of what chains you are using.

This request will share your selected addresses as well as chain information such as id, name, symbol, decimals and chainId. Excersice caution as your addresses will be shared with the requester.

fusion.pa_info: Les actifs parall√®les (PA) sont des actifs suppl√©mentaires de Flux sur diff√©rentes blockchains. swap.estimated_amount: Due to the volatile nature of the cryptocurrency market, you may receive more or fewer coins than initially expected.
swap.floating_rate_fluctuates: The actual market rate at which a trade transaction is executed might differ from the rate shown at the time your trading order was submitted. This means that the final value of your trade could be different than initially indicated.

walletconnect.title: WalletConnect
walletconnect.connect_description: Connect to Web3 dApps by pasting WalletConnect URI from the dApp
walletconnect.confirm_disconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect this session?
walletconnect.enter_uri: Please enter a valid WalletConnect URI
walletconnect.dapp_requests_signature: The dApp is requesting you to sign a message.

walletconnect.need_public_nonces: Public nonces are required for EVM transactions. Please confirm on your SSP Key.
walletconnect.dapp_requests_chain_switch: The dApp is requesting to switch to a different chain.
walletconnect.switch_chain_warning: Switching chains will change your active addresses. Each chain has unique addresses in SSP Wallet.
walletconnect.chain_unique_addresses_desc: SSP Wallet generates different addresses for each blockchain network to ensure security. Using an address on the wrong blockchain may result in permanent loss of funds.
walletconnect.address_loss_warning: Important: This address is for {{chainName}} network only

walletconnect.chain_not_supported: Chain {{chainName}} is not supported by SSP Wallet
walletconnect.dapp_wants_to_connect: A dApp wants to connect to your wallet
walletconnect.connection_warning: Only connect to dApps you trust. Connections can view your account balance and request transaction approvals. Interacting with malicious dApps may result in permanent loss of funds. Always verify the dApp's authenticity before connecting.
walletconnect.required_chains_warning: Please select all chains required by the dApp and at least one account for each selected chain.
walletconnect.unsupported_chains_warning: Some requested chains are not supported
walletconnect.unsynced_chains_warning: Some supported chains need to be synced first
walletconnect.no_compatible_chains_desc: This dApp requires chains that are either not supported or not synced with your SSP Wallet. Please sync the required chains first.

walletconnect.chain_not_synced: {{chainName}} is not synced with your SSP Key
walletconnect.chain_sync_required: Please sync {{chainName}} with your SSP Key before switching to this network
walletconnect.addressDeployed: Address is deployed and ready for use
walletconnect.addressNotDeployed: Address not deployed - limited functionality with dApps
walletconnect.account_abstraction_deployment_desc: Smart contract addresses require deployment (first transaction) for EIP-1271 signature verification. Non-deployed addresses may have limited dApp compatibility.
walletconnect.defaulting_to_ethereum_desc: This dApp didn't specify any chains or requested an invalid chain (Chain ID 0). We're defaulting to Ethereum (Chain ID 1) to ensure proper functionality.
walletconnect.chain_compatibility_desc_1: You are currently on {{chainName}} (non-EVM chain), but this dApp requires EVM blockchain functionality.
walletconnect.chain_compatibility_desc_2: When you approve signing requests, we will share your Ethereum addresses instead. You can switch to an EVM chain anytime in your wallet.
walletconnect.address_not_found_current_chain: Address not found in current chain. Chain switch should have been performed before signing.

walletconnect.address_different_chain: The address exists on a different chain than currently active.
walletconnect.eth_sign_transaction_not_supported: eth_signTransaction is not supported by Account Abstraction wallets. Please use eth_sendTransaction instead.
walletconnect.eth_sign_transaction_error: eth_signTransaction is not supported by Account Abstraction wallets. Account Abstraction wallets use UserOperations instead of traditional transactions. Please use eth_sendTransaction to execute the transaction directly.

welcome_overview.title: Welcome to SSP Wallet!
welcome_overview.content: You've successfully synced SSP Wallet with SSP Key and connected to the Bitcoin blockchain! Your wallet is now ready to use. Here you can see your wallet address and balance. Always verify that the wallet address displayed here matches the address shown on your SSP Key device.

multi_chain_intro.title: Multiple Blockchain Support
multi_chain_intro.content: SSP Wallet supports multiple blockchains! This dropdown shows your current wallet and chain. Click on it to access chain switching options.

find_switch_chain.title: Switch Chain Button
find_switch_chain.content: Perfect! Now click on "Switch Chain" to open the blockchain selection where you can choose different networks.

select_ethereum.title: Select Ethereum
select_ethereum.content: Great! The chain selection modal is open. Now click on Ethereum to switch to the Ethereum blockchain. This will trigger synchronization with the Ethereum network.

ethereum_sync_waiting.title: Sync with SSP Key
ethereum_sync_waiting.content: To begin synchronizing with the Ethereum blockchain, scan the QR code with your SSP Key. This will enable your wallet to interact with Ethereum, its tokens and dApps.
ethereum_sync_waiting.sync_hint: The tutorial will continue automatically once sync is complete.

ethereum_tokens.title: Welcome to Ethereum!
ethereum_tokens.content: You're now on Ethereum! This chain supports smart contracts and ERC-20 tokens. The Tokens section lets you manage your token portfolio - view, add, or search for popular tokens like USDT and USDC.

add_token_demo.title: Adding Tokens
add_token_demo.content: Click here to add new tokens. You can search for popular tokens like USDT or add custom tokens by entering their contract address.

receive_intro.title: Receiving Funds
receive_intro.content: Click Receive to get your Ethereum address. This address can receive ETH and any ERC-20 tokens. You can copy the address or use the QR code.

send_intro.title: Sending Funds
send_intro.content: The Send button opens the transaction interface where you can send cryptocurrency to other addresses. It includes fields for recipient, amount, and fees.

swap_feature.title: Swap Feature
swap_feature.content: Exchange one cryptocurrency for another instantly. Swap between different tokens or convert ETH to tokens.

buy_sell_feature.title: Buy & Sell Crypto
buy_sell_feature.content: Purchase cryptocurrency with fiat currency or sell your crypto for cash. This integrates with trusted payment providers.

activity_section.title: Transaction History
activity_section.content: The Activity section shows your complete transaction history. View sent, received, and pending transactions with full details.

activity_explanation.title: Your Transactions
activity_explanation.content: Here you can see all your transactions - incoming, outgoing, and pending. Click any transaction for detailed information including fees and confirmations.

contacts_section.title: Contacts Management
contacts_section.content: The Contacts section lets you save frequently used addresses with custom names. This makes sending funds easier and safer.

contacts_explanation.title: Your Address Book
contacts_explanation.content: Save addresses you send to frequently. Each contact has a name and address, making transactions more convenient and reducing errors.

extended_menu_intro.title: Advanced Menu Features
extended_menu_intro.content: This menu provides access to advanced features: WalletConnect for connecting to dApps, Address Details, SSP Wallet Details, Settings and more. The lock icon on the right securely logs you out.

address_management.title: Wallets Management
address_management.content: This dropdown manages multiple addresses per blockchain. You can create new addresses, switch between existing ones, or remove the last created address. Each address is independent with its own balance and transaction history.

tutorial_complete.title: Tutorial Complete!
tutorial_complete.content: Congratulations! You now know how to use all major features of SSP Wallet. Explore confidently and manage your crypto securely.
